name: Five Nights in Anime
summary: Five Nights in Anime aka FNIA is a parody that takes the original FNaF characters and turns them into Anime Girls (kinda?). Although they mean no harm, their desire to play and tease the Night Guard can lead to danger. They don't share the same lore with the official characters aside from little things like Freddy being the band leader, the golden animatronics and puppet being more paranormal and mysterious, etc.
